mapper.select: SELECT i.INDIVIDUAL_INQUIRY_NO as individualNo, c.CATEGORY_NAME as "categoryName.name", u.user_name as "userName.name", i.INDIVIDUAL_INQUIRY_TITLE as individualTitle, i.INDIVIDUAL_INQUIRY_UPDATE_DATE as individualUpdateDate FROM BookHub.INDIVIDUAL_INQUIRIES i JOIN BookHub.USER u ON i.INQUIRY_USER_NO = u.user_no JOIN BookHub.CATEGORY c ON i.INQUIRY_CATEGORY_NO = c.CATEGORY_NO WHERE i.INDIVIDUAL_INQUIRY_ANSWER_YN = 0 AND i.INDIVIDUAL_INQUIRY_DELETE_YN = 0 GROUP BY c.CATEGORY_NAME order by INDIVIDUAL_INQUIRY_NO desc

SELECT individual_inquiry_no as no, c.CATEGORY_NAME as "faqCategory.name", u.user_name as "user.name", i.individual_inquiry_title as title, i.individual_inquiry_content as content, i.individual_inquiry_create_date as createdDate FROM BookHub.INDIVIDUAL_INQUIRIES i JOIN BookHub.USER u ON i.INQUIRY_USER_NO = u.user_no JOIN BookHub.CATEGORY c ON i.INQUIRY_CATEGORY_NO = c.CATEGORY_NO WHERE INDIVIDUAL_INQUIRY_NO = #{no}

SELECT i.INDIVIDUAL_INQUIRY_NO as individualNo, c.CATEGORY_NAME as "categoryName.name", u.user_name as "userName.name", i.INDIVIDUAL_INQUIRY_TITLE as individualTitle, i.INDIVIDUAL_INQUIRY_UPDATE_DATE as individualUpdateDate FROM BookHub.INDIVIDUAL_INQUIRIES i JOIN BookHub.USER u ON i.INQUIRY_USER_NO = u.user_no JOIN BookHub.CATEGORY c ON i.INQUIRY_CATEGORY_NO = c.CATEGORY_NO WHERE i.INDIVIDUAL_INQUIRY_ANSWER_YN = 1 AND i.INDIVIDUAL_INQUIRY_DELETE_YN = 0 GROUP BY c.CATEGORY_NAME order by INDIVIDUAL_INQUIRY_NO desc

SELECT c.INQUIRY_RESPONSE_COMMENT_NO as no, c.INQUIRY_NO as "inquiry.no", c.INQUIRY_RESPONSE_COMMENT_ADMIN_NO as "admin.no", c.INQUIRY_RESPONSE_COMMENT_CONTENT as comment, c.INQUIRY_RESPONSE_COMMENT_CREATE_DATE as createDate, c.INQUIRY_RESPONSE_COMMENT_UPDATE_DATE as updateDate from BookHub.INQUIRY_RESPONSE_COMMENTS c join BookHub.INDIVIDUAL_INQUIRIES i ON c.INQUIRY_NO = i.INDIVIDUAL_INQUIRY_NO where i.INDIVIDUAL_INQUIRY_NO = #{no}
